Array: Gooooood evening everyone, and welcome to the Quiz Show with our contestant [MAINCHAR]!
Here we are again, tonight only, with [MAINCHAR] for Trivia Time!
Welcome all, to tonight's event featuring none other than [MAINCHAR]!
Uh oh! We've got a WRONG answer here!
Ooooh, unfortunately, that's not what we were looking for.
It appears you are out of tries.Thank you for playing!
Oh, you are good! Here's a little something for that impressive performance.
And we have a winner! Congratulations!
Aaaaaand GAME! As you can see, it's very simple. I ask some questions, and you do your best to answer them. If you win, you get a prize!
Oh, there's also a "call on your friend" thing, but I'll just let you experiment with that yourself!

We've got a couple of <color=magic>question packs</color>, but rumor has it there are more of them to be found! If you find any, be sure to <color=magic>bring them to me</color> and we'll play, alright?
Okay, that's it for today, then! Thanks for playing, and I'll see YOU next time!
This is it, folks! [MAINCHAR] has completed all of the questions packs and is officially LORE MASTER!!!
You have earned the ultimate prize. Congratulations!
Thank you for playing, and please feel free to drop by if you want to try some of the packs again!
